title: What are your 5 most hated champions in order?
body:
(telling why is optional)
1. {{champion:114}} (The thing that makes me hate her so much is her w. It makes no sense and in high elo is a nightmare to play against her cuz of it)
2. {{champion:67}}  (not only is she a powerful adc, she is a powerful duelist)
3. {{champion:164}}  (if there is one thing i hate is overloaded champions)
4. {{champion:266}} (I still remember when he was released what he was, if he is ever viable again...)
5. {{champion:64}} (or {{champion:92}} depending on who is more viable, but since lee is almost 95% viable he takes it)

replies.body:
{{champion:99}}  : Every time I see this champion I camp my tower or I'm forced to play an Assassin to delete her from the game once she uses her spells on me and misses.  Such a boring lane, don't get me started on her laugh.

{{champion:1}} : Has no skill shots honestly, I'm just happy a lot of people don't play her anymore.. She'll burn you so bad that a new level of hell will be created.

{{champion:103}} : Has a Q she can use and gain movement speed WITHOUT hitting me.. Including 3 Dashes & a Flash.  Basically 4 flashes, way to safe.

{{champion:84}} : Not hard to deal with to be honest, but she's like this woman who is FORCING you to have her babies and won't get away from you until you give in and suffer.

{{champion:55}} : Honestly? Most of the time I don't even feel out played when I vs this champion.. I most of the time ask my self as I  vs her "Wait what just happened?" I despise her more than the old Katarina, that's pretty sad.

______________________________________

Just realized I mainly dislike female champions, but either way the champions are rather annoying.

I thought I was the only one who thought about Katarina like that

She does everything so fucking fast it doesn't even feel fair and snowballs like crazy

At least old katarina couldn't build bruiser and zone you away from her daggers

>high utility


>{{champion:238}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:67}}

Fizz and Vayne have quite high utility relative to their role. 

Vayne has a knockback/stun, which is actually really good utility for an ADC, it's not Ashe level, but it's well above average. 

Fizz has a giant fuckoff slow field and a knockup. That gives him some of the highest utility in the assassin class. He's pretty much on par with Ekko for the highest in his class.

{{champion:157}} 

Congratulations, the king of "high risk, high reward" has entered the game. The match has now become a 1-man show where it's all about who feeds, and who gets fed, on the yasuo lane.

Yasuo can feed, and then Yasuo loses the game for me: Yasuo, and not me.  I have to deal with his fed opponent as he tries to farm up his late game in some secluded side lane and gets gangbanged over and over again.

Yasuo can get fed, and then Yasuo wins the game for me: Yasuo, and not me. I can do whatever I want, as long as I trololol a bit in front of the opponents with a some tank items to waste their time, and provide a handy knockup on demand. 

"high risk, high reward" is a form of cancer to the game. A blight, because it constitutes a removal of agency from the other players involved. Of-course i don't mind doing the high risk high reward myself: it's when other people do it that I mind; You play a simple, conservative champion - leave the high risk fail the team or win the team, to me. 

me me me me me.

1. {{champion:245}} this guy is the most overloaded champion in league...an assassin with tank assets multiple AoE cc effects. he has high burst, movement Steroids, percentage health damage (W passive effect for low hp) a dash AND a blink which BOTH can go over walls, AoE stun, AoE slow, reset ult with health regen and insane burst, amazing synergy with a lot of team comps, amazing waveclear, amazing jungle clear, strong as fuck roam potential and ganking power. if there is one champion that you put as the face of "this guy can do too much" then it is ekko

2. {{champion:268}} yeah you almost never see him These days and he certainly is in a very bad spot but the few people who do Play him are fucking Monsters. it does not matter what i do or who i Play, azir mains always find some way to win their laning phase, be it with E-Q baits, ulting me under their Tower, poking me consistently. there is NOTHING i can do vs azir Players no matter how much i prepare myself. i have to throw the game and buy 3 Counter items at least to just manage to get his face down the Floor of shame. azir is scary because he has this teemo effect. either the Player is utter trash on him or he is a 1v5 carry god.

3. {{champion:79}} he is somewhat self explanatory for me as an assassin main. he has damage reduction that with no cdr is on a 8-3 second cooldown, he has one of the longest dashes in the game being able to go through almost any walls except the very fat ones at the edge of top and bot lane, he has an AoE disengage that can be used like a beast to shoot you undertower, he has very strong sustain AND burst damage thanks to his low cooldowns and his high Q numbers. and there is no uglier feeling in the world than being oneshot by a fat, drunk, halfway passed out semi naked redneck

4. {{champion:34}} her egg....her fucking egg passive, her wall that can cockblock any champion relying on movement speed, her stupendously strong waveclear once she hits 6, she has AoE presence for the teamfights, she has zoning potential, she has strong as heck burst, her Q can be quick tapped to stun a melee champion. she has so much damage and presence and if it was not for the difficulty of her Q and ult placements and hittings she would be a total Monster, so much i would consider her an assassin mage on par with veigar

5. {{champion:82}} people underestimate him so much. you often see him and you think to yourself "mmm yummy, give momma some of dat feed" and suddenly you hear it....**BONK** and you are dead AND on their side now aswell. YOUR super fed vayne is now THEIR super fed vayne. what is most scary about him is how low his cooldowns are, he can already in the earlygame have both sustain and burst damage which is UNRIVALED if you manage to hit your skills and Q empowered AA. mordekaiser mains are terrifying because they can also get bonus stats from having the dragon on their side. and if used right his ult can give you both a dragon AND an enemy to participate as allies making this 5v5 into a 7v4. thought he can be kyted effectively, all you Need is to pack in stormraiders surge on him and manage to get a single Q hit on someone squishy to eliminate the one and only way of counterplaying you. people underestimate morde so much
Mordekaiser is awful if you play mostly melee champs like me. There seems to never be any window to fight this guy without getting blown up.
I'd just list all mage supports since they're ruining my life of tank supports :P

> [{quoted}](name=OurLestrade,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v80iAcIG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-08T12:35:24.851+0000)
>
> I'd just list all mage supports since they're ruining my life of tank supports :P

I like when there is variety, the problem is that they have been too strong for almost 3 seasons and there are no viable tank supports unless they are overpowered.

{{champion:157}} The match up feels like it's 100% him. If he sucks, you'll win. If he is good, you'll get fucked.
{{champion:245}} Overloaded. Dude has 5/5 utility and yet still had more base damage and scaling damage than Veigar. That makes no sense. They nerfed him, but he is still stupidly overloaded.
{{champion:53}} Just a personal hate. Not really that OP or anything. Just annoying. Dodge 100 hooks, meh. Get hit by one, you're dead.
{{champion:63}} Support. Doesn't even build AP and still 100-0 everything.
{{champion:64}} Again, just overloaded to shit. It also doesn't help that they keep releasing skins for this champion so noobs buy the skin and play Lee even though they have no clue what they're doing and make me lose.

1. {{champion:67}} I hate building tank items only to have them not mean anything. Even if the enemy Vayne is behind by the time it hits 40 minutes she's almost full build and nuking everyone.

2. {{champion:104}} As someone who loves playing melee champions, Graves is my worst nightmare. The best I can do is facetank all of his shots and hope my ranged teammates can kill him fast enough so I'm around for objectives.

3. {{champion:1}} Zero. Counterplay. Free. Stun. Maximum. Fun. To. Fight. *Eye twitches*

4. {{champion:105}} Apparently standing on top of a 2 foot trident makes you totally safe from everything.

5. {{champion:122}} As much as like playing him, I HATE fighting him. If he's low on health, he'll heal more thanks to his Q healing for a % of his missing hp. W makes it super easy to last hit. E makes your armor mean nothing. Passive makes it so you can't do shit early (unless you're ranged or are playing a melee champ with ranged abilities) because you'll give him free AD and a DoT that does more damage than all of Cassia's poisons.
Overloaded champions, it's always the overloaded ones. Riot refuses to swallow their pride and remove something, so they just keep nerfing them repeatedly instead.

You forgot to specify that as they nerf, they will constantly hit everything _but_ the problem. 

{{champion:429}}: Hops around like a kangaroo on crack for no logical reason and no one can touch her? Riot responds by giving her 90% AD effectiveness.  Fucking lol.....

{{champion:11}} Nobody on my team knows how to deal with him. EVER. Did you burst me down? Wrong! I pressed E to get 70% damage reduction lol! You have slows? ULT. Also 0/10 early? Still gets a pentakill at 35 minutes in. 

{{champion:35}} Play safe and dont push for the rest of the lane phase. Still one shots you later. Do I have to say anything more? Also really annoying.

{{champion:64}} Why, why, why Rito around 3-4 dashes a point and click ult, and a player base that has a VO like God-Fist Lee Sin while feeding.

{{champion:23}} Poked? Press q to heal. All in early? Press q to heal and crit several times in a row. All in later? Press r to Never die and e to escape.

{{champion:120}} Unstoppable AOE fear, Self heals, Karthus q cooldown, and Press E to become sonic. Also impossible to kill later on, while still dealing the most dmg on the enemy team.

Honorable mentions:
{{champion:63}} The bane of my existence, no matter who i play, fizz, cass, fiora, irelia, katarina, nope 100 -0 in teamfights and 1v1s. Not to mention he screws my botlane hard.

{{champion:86}} Sitting in a bush for 10 seconds makes you feel... Determination. Your HP has been fully restored!

I don't know what you mean by in order but if you mean from the most annoying to the least worst, mine is gonna look a littler weird:

1 (TIE). {{champion:222}} Those auto attacks are so damn annoying. {{champion:18}} She's not even shooting correctly, it just looks like her front side is popping out a dozen times a second. Why is she allowed to dive every time she get gets a kill? {{champion:103}} SHE'S IN EVERY SINGLE GAME!
2. {{champion:39}} I swear to god this rework couldn't have come any sooner. She can blindly dive you not even knowing the outcome just because she wants kills with 100% point and click abilities that don't even to be landed.
3. {{champion:23}} TEAM! LOOK AT YOUR MAP AND HELP ME! <goes to location and dies in 3 seconds>
4. {{champion:157}}: Doesn't even have to be good, he can either be obnoxious in lane and have this ultimate up every 50 seconds, or he could do absolutely nothing and wait for a jungler to come by and then presses R. I was literally playing him before and I was spamming my ultimate in a black, unwarded area of the map and for some reason I ulted someone that got knocked up by a Janna hurricane.
5. {{champion:76}} Stop being a big pussy and let me hit you whenever you miss everything.

{{champion:17}} Designed to have 0 counter-play.

{{champion:76}} manaless wave-clear and mobility, self heal, one of the highest damage and longest range non-ults on low cooldown. I queued up for a MOBA, not a bullet hell. At least the hit-box isn't 5 Teemos wide anymore.

{{champion:429}} F'ing ult. NEVER BE ON MY TEAM!
Actually. The passive and back-loaded damage makes her pretty cancer to play against too. But the ult is worse.

{{champion:157}} Lots of counter-play. Finally!
And enough safety nets to make all that counter-play pointless. (- -_- -)

{{champion:23}} Pray to RNGesus. It alone decides the outcome of lane.
Also useless for anything but split-pushing.

{{champion:114}} I disliked the rework when it happened, adds less counterplay to the baguette wielding lady. Hate the minigame you're forced to play, even if you do good you most likely lose or are never not going even.

{{champion:157}} Free crit chance, free shield for moving, high mobility in laning, W fucks any ranged person in the game.

{{champion:67}} Rip if you're not playing someone who can see her while Invis, Rip any tank.

{{champion:427}} I AM THE TREELORD, I SPEAK FOR THE ANIMALS

{{champion:35}} boxboxbox

extra: {{champion:23}} Always crits me 4 our of the first 5 hits even with 10% - 20% crit from his passive, never crits on the fifth hit because 35% crit tho.

{{champion:64}} {{champion:35}}  2 popular characters who are mostly utterly useless 

{{champion:99}} {{champion:103}} because they are unfun to play against

{{champion:26}} secretly most broken ap champion

yasuo
yasuo
yasuo
yasuo
yasuo

{{champion:4}} fuck this %%%% and his no cooldown targeted nukes, and his global ult that makes it impossible to fight because he'll 3v2 if you go in or clean up if you get low and go back to your turret.
{{champion:429}} obvious reasons
{{champion:245}} "hurr i get to have everything and if i fuck up i'll just press R"
{{champion:64}} i'm just tired of this guy. sick of dodging Qs until he lands one and then deletes me, or misses them until he wardhops in my face and deletes me.
{{champion:203}} probably one of the worst designs in the game
{{champion:122}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:63}}

{{champion:45}} Outplayed

{{champion:105}} Feeding time

{{champion:111}} Nautilus smash

{{champion:78}} You won't kill me

{{champion:51}}

1.) {{champion:157}} (Has 2 passives that are offensive and defensive, Q damage is stupid, W lasts too long, has too short of a cooldown, E should not deal any damage and needs longer cooldown, ult can be used 2-3 times more often than other ultimates, but is more powerful
2.) {{champion:122}} (The healing is just stupid, you can trade with him, but when you walk away he pulls you back in, and basically gets twice as much damage off, also POINT AND CLICK TRUE DAMAGE)
3.) {{champion:4}}  (I know it is strange, but his stun is so easy to hit and last so long for how long it is up)
4.){{champion:64}} (I think you know why, POINT AND CLICK CC, NO COUNTERPLAY)
5.) {{champion:45}} (Can miss Q and W, but can just press R and you are dead in a fight, also if you are within his E distance you are dead 75% of the time)

{{champion:157}} as an Eve main i dumpster him in lane, but his kit is just so toxic and overloaded. losing a trade or failing to secure a kill because his shield comes up tilts me off the face of the earth. Not to mention windwall blocks everything including my Q and getting ulted by him off of his team is just FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF. And GOD i'm tired of seeing at least one of him every. single. game.(main reason he's #1)
{{champion:64}} Tired AF of seeing him same as yas(main reason he's #2). my only real problem with him is his ward hop. dodging Q just for him to ward hop flash ult me is aids. Or using ward hop to guarantee he lands Q.
{{champion:122}} No counter-play if you are melee and unlike other lane bullies he scales into a late game monster so it's lose-lose based on matchup. He's the main reason i don't play top lane.
{{champion:42}} (mid lane corki) if you have played against it you know what i'm talking about. If you haven't then pray you never do.
{{champion:45}} 3 {{item:3089}}s worth of AP from his passive at 20 min + massive area stun + his ult = not my idea of fun(at least they got rid of his ults broken "scales off enemy AP" BS)

HM {{champion:429}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:223}} thankfully these champs are not played/got gutted.

{{champion:157}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:16}}

Edit: I'm also loving how as I read through the thread, pretty much everyone has a downvote from someone who is offended that their champion is on the list or something. Learn to empathize and accept that maybe your favored champion isn't healthy in one aspect or another.

{{champion:254}} Has CC, tankyness, burst, sustained damage, health shred, armor shred, tons of mobility, range on E, and waveclear. Not to forget her ult with _literally_ no counterplay. I hate the hell out of Vi lol.

{{champion:11}} If he's ahead, there is a very low chance you can stop him. https://imgur.com/a/ubeWB I still have flashbacks.

{{champion:245}} Oh boy... An assassin (I know he's considered a slayer/skirmisher or whatever, but hes very similar to assassins) with CC is enough to deal with. But its like Riot wanted him to have a shit ton of safety too. His E+Q+Auto combos chunk me and than he just sprints away. His ult is such a free escape too, and I get its an ult but its beyond words frustrating and overloaded.

{{champion:90}} His ult is the bane of my existance. 

{{champion:89}} Getting picks on bot lane as her really boils down to knowing where the enemy jungler is and landing your sword dash.

1. Blitz
2. Blitz
3. Lux
4. Lee Sin
5. Shaco

Yasuo. No, not because I'm a terrible player that can't git gud. Because I'm an Ahri main, and he is her biggest counter.

Blitzcrank. Nobody on my team can dodge his Q.

Zed. It's not playing against him, but playing him. Lamest champion ever. I would seriously rather play Aatrox.

Pantheon. _Especially_ lethality Pantheon. He's a Vayne, to me: my team's Pantheon will feed, theirs will dominate. And he counters Ahri hardcore.

Finalot...Ziggs. His fucking turret execute is bullshit, and he's just so obnoxious to fight.
{{champion:157}} {{champion:555}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:105}}

1. {{champion:11}} 'Oh he's only good in low elo' well guess what bitch we in low elo and look he got a pentakill. 

2. {{champion:53}} People make up excuses like 'just stay behind minions' like that actually means anything. I can handle him in lane, sometimes my lane partner can't and thats fun... Him randomly winning the game with a pick because we can't get 100% ward coverage is what tilts me. And I play Morg and can't usually E in time if he has a clear shot on both.

3. {{champion:238}} Oh look the perfect laner. Can't shove against him, can't gank him, can't build my mana item because if I don't go {{item:3191}} I'm dead. Meanwhile he doesn't have to worry about mana. And then when I play against him right (basically don't interact at all) he runs bot and gets a double kill despite my pings.

4. {{champion:75}} I've thought he was bullshit far before his R/Q buff. The fact he can 1v2, UNDER your inhib tower, get a kill and force your flash to escape, you go back to fountain, come back and he's full health because of his passive, is ridiculous at any stage of the game. I can get over an 80% uptime slow, I can get over twoshotting people at 40 mins, but the passive needs to be on-champ only.

5. {{champion:122}} overloaded auto-win (in lane) trash. Get rid of that r%%%%%ed instant-5 stack garbage. Make him work for his teamfight relevance, cause he certainly doesn't have to work for anything else...

Jarvan 4, just can't beat him in JG
Lee Sin, I forget why, he's been permabanned for a few years.
Vayne, I'm not even a bot laner but ---- that -----
Zed, have gotten him in arams and other modes, guys 0 skill and 0 resources, basically a ranged assassin disguised as a melee one.
Reserved for next release.

1) {{champion:63}} : When I try to play brand he has such low ability range. When I play against a brand he hits me almost off of screen. Wtfh.

2) {{champion:119}} : Slip up once and he wins game. Keep him down forever and let him get one kill and he still wins game. Annoying af. 

3) {{champion:24}} : Super strong early game. Insanely strong late game. I mean the team that has a jax is the team that wins. 

4) {{champion:238}} : How is a champion with 3 built in flashes that 1 shots most other champs considered fair? Landing a skill shot on a competant zed is impossible. 

5) {{champion:143}} : Damn her plants. Way too tanky and way too much dmg.
{{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:45}}{{champion:122}}
{{champion:6}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:58}}

5{{champion:122}} An incredible pain to fight against if your jungler isn't there, and is very hard to escape from.

4{{champion:145}} Deals unholy damage and practically unhittable, and can snipe you from a mile away.

3{{champion:555}} If he lands his Q and his ADC isn't an idiot, you aren't getting away without blowing a flash at least. Has a stun and an execute ult which is practically a death sentence if you aren't a tank.

2{{champion:157}} Insane amount of damage, can cancel any and all projectiles headed for him, and darts around you so quick it's hard to target him. Not to mention the player is almost always toxic.

1{{champion:99}} If she hits you with her Q and has more than 2 brain cells, you are dead. She roots with her Q, (If her allies don't get to you first) slows then burst damages you with her E, and then even if you manage to blow your flash, she hits you with her ult, which if it doesn't kill you, the meteor she has probably will. And if she has a {{item:3089}} or 2 she might not even need to blow her ult.

{{champion:142}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:20}} are just annoying.

There's really only three that I universally hate, everything else is really dependent on how good in the meta they are currently.

{{champion:497}} - I hate everything about this champ. His kit is obnoxious as hell to play against and is emblematic of the "fun for me but not for you" kind of playstyle that certain notable annoying champs embody. I hate mobility, and this guy has mobility out the ass. He can basically sentence an entire grouped team to death with his ult. Not to mention the fact that his character is a giant douchenozzle that's supposed to be "likeable". Not fun at all. However, my teammates can play around him more than they can the next one, which is why I don't ban him. He's the only champ I refuse to play out of principle.

{{champion:117}} - She is, by far, the absolute least fun champ to play against. Her synergy with Kog who is one of the least fun marksmen to play against is one of the best synergies in the game, like seriously, I've never seen him die in lane while he's had a Lulu support. She's got something for every situation, but polymorph has to be the most infuriating thing about her kit. Between her normal slows and that, good luck trying to get out of anything.

{{champion:142}} - Might actually be the stupidest champ design I've ever seen. Just because every other champ can currently one-shot people doesn't make the fact that she could always do it with one ability any less ridiculous. The fun part is that she can, and very often does it offscreen as well. Stupid.

{{champion:51}} and {{champion:98}} just annoy me rather than make me dread not banning them.
